content: Too many bugs to be playable. Frequently crashes or won't allow you to log in.
Please fix the bugs. The game is fun but the app keeps bugging. In a 3 player game, there is almost no way that we finish a game because one of the 3 person will disconnect or his app would freeze
Keeps crashing when downloading assets (Xperia Xz2 Compact)
wow
This game works much better as an in person, table top experience, but this app is... Okay
Getting kicked out of the account after each game and need to login again every single time after a game, will not use on phone until it is fixed...

As others have said, please don't waste time or money on this game. While the game is really good, the application is awful. We've only managed to complete a game once in 9 tries. The app crashes or logs a player out and once that happens, you cannot get back in the game. You're immediately replaced by an AI.
Fun an frustrations cause giggles. Delightful group game.
Excellent fun game recommend the board game version as well.
I get automatically logged out every time after returning to lobby
Bug, crash,... New update is required
Crashes at launch every time during the additional content download phase

This game is so buggy it's almost unplayable. The art and music are really fun, but getting kicked out of half the games midway through? Not worth it. Plus you have to log in after EVERY GAME. Too glitchy!
The game violates the actual rules. Plus what little player base exists all metagame.
Great way to play a board game with pals during quarantine! Thanks especially for the zoom option.
Not what I thought it was
Really fun game esp for lock down. Bit buggy though keep getting logged out and sometimes logged in but can't see anyone in the lobby or any of the games.

A lot like the board game, fun to play only problem is in storymode its not very random so if you fail once you know who the killer is and you can just cheat your way to the end, would have been better not to reveal the killer unless you are correct.
Great game brought to mobile, only giving 4 stars because i consistently get disconnected from my account after finishing a game
Fantastic way of sharing the original board game.
Fun with friends
Just crashes
Good game has a login in issue once finished a game which can be annoying but overall, great.
The app doesn't work. Have tried reinstalling a couple of times.

The concept, story and art is awesome. Unfortunately the app is quite buggy which is a major detractor. The selling point of the game is being able to play with others, however this is not a good experience since there is a bug with a duplicate state error and forces to manually sign in to your account for every single game. Often times the sign in doesn't work so you have to close the game and open and sign in again. Please fix.
Very buggy. Most games have error messages. Write failures, duplicate sessions etc. Auto sign out very often too

Absolutely love love the game itself but the app isnt very good. Everytime I finish a round I'm logged out and have to re sign in every time (you can't play unless you are signed in) for the last few days it's not even letting you into the lobby with constantly exiting and re entering and sometimes randomly boots you out in the middle of the game. I no it's not just me because many other players in the group chat have said they're having the same issues.
Pretty good
better with real people than a computer opponent. With real people definitly 5 stars
Crappy and bugged interface
While it's working, it is fine, but unfortunately, it keeps dropping me out of the game with my friends. Pixel 3 XL
Oe la custiÃ³n wuenaa
Love it! Yay

Cannot play online I try to login - it recognizes my user name and I can login successfully if I do it within Options, but when I go to the Play screen, it always says I am not logged in. I try to login from there, but I stay "not logged in".

Great game, Minor issues with staying connected with account, have to log in almost after every game. Would be nice to have to not log in everytime. There is a connect to Facebook mode, but unable to connect. Would a great way to share the game online for more people to play.
Really cool. Theres a problem with connection where u need to connect nearly after every game. Fix that. But its really playable and calm and fun
Good except hate having to relog into the account every game.
Keeps saying that it's looking for resources to download but when I check the progress it says 0mb/0mb downloaded and then crashes

Great replication of the board game, however every online game player reports as a duplicate session and then I have to re enter user name and password to play online again ... this bug is very annoying !
Would love if it saved my log in.... shouldn't have to log in everytime I'd like to play.
Perfect
It's been fun so far. I think the AI does a good job of acting like people would and make decent choices based on the cards they're given.
Just play it on Steam. The app doesn't work. Tried for well over an hour. We all had significant issues with it. Randomly getting booted from the game gets annoying
Fun game. Some minor glitches, such as the inability to link FB and it logging you out.
Fun
Good game, nice art, great sound design, easy to get into. Really fun to play solo or the story mode. Playing with others either online or pass & play is where the game really shines.

Login / Story Mode hamper an otherwise great experience. You'll find yourself constant re-entering your login info if you want to play online. Sometimes it gets caught in an endless loop and forces you to reboot the app. It's a pretty serious bug. The fourth story mode level is all out of whack and the bots seem to choose the culprit at random. Very frustrating. However, when the game works it works very well and feels similar to the board game. Hope they can resolve these issues for a 5/5 app.

I am unable to create an online account. I entered my email and created a password. Then it tells me to select login, which I try to do. But that prompts me to type an input, for what I've no idea. ??????
Fun game, but really buggy. Have to close it between games or be logged out every single time

Gameplay is good and identical to the physical board game. Almost no community, so the online play is not possible at all. The only way to play is against AI in solo mode which beats the purpose of high price point of the game.
Amazing although it seems to log you out of your account after a game. It truley is a brilliant game very close to the board game. Amazing version, please bring out some more expansion!!! LOVE THIS!
Great game
Quite a bit of fun. Can be frustrating at times but that's what happens when you have to solve mysteries with abstract art.

I like the boardgame far better because you interract with the other players and have fun. But this is a very well done with funtional AI players. Too few real players though. The character we allways thought of as a cartographer seems to be a teacher :-) Makes it easier if you agree on those things. I can give all cards about water for the bathroom location and the AI players don't get it at all...
Great game, although a couple of issues with it randomly logging me out.

I love this game. It can be fun, and has nice features. The online lobby is getting busier as well. However, there are many bugs. It freezes, both in game and lobby, people get kicked from games, and you have to relog in after every game. I have been playing it for over a year, despite the bugs, because it is so fun, and in that time they have made no effort to fix things. It is a shame because it is otherwise 5 star worthy
Fun game, really gets you thinking. If matched with good co op players it's even better. Would benefit from more players, so let's go people! Also please fix the issue that causes resigning in!
It's just a guessing game, the cards don't make sense.

I've wanted to purchase the physical board game. Playing it digital to try it out for myself is not just a good way of feeling the game but also learning the rules. Asmodee does a great job of translating it to digital, but teaching how a game is played. This game is no exception to that.
Great implementation, even for solo. Just wish the game lobby was busier. Tends to crash after team game completes.
love the game but hate that it makes me log back in after every game

I enjoy this game as electronically as much as I enjoy the tabletop version. I just wished we had more players online! I know I don't use Steam because of permissions Steam wants on my computer, so I'm limited to using my phone :(

Okay. It's mainly about comparing cards and looking for clues in the pictures to see which card links with another card. Sometimes it's extremely difficult when playing the ghost to find clues you can give to the psychics. You get cards which contain absolutely no related objects and you have to resort to a very very vague potential hint, e.g. A card with a gun, plus a card containing metal objects. Naturally the psychics don't get it right, or if they do, they don't get the final suspect.
Love this game, great artwork. Playing the ghost is challenging and rewarding if you get good cards.
Continuous troubles to login. The game would deserve 4 stars but its digital implementation is very poor.
Love the board game version, this is just as good

Clues are so vague and never have good cards. How are you supposed to have a chance at winning? Takes me so long to decide on a card because none of them have anything relevant in them. I wouldn't play multiplayer because of it.
good game
pointless game the clues are meaningless and the instructions don't explain anything it is literally guessing I've requested a full refund after 5 minutes of playing don't waste your time or money
Love Mysterium. played it on my Google Pixel 2XL, but just got a Pixel 3a XL. it says mysterium is not compatible. Will compatibility with the Pixel 3a XL be added soon? thanks.
It could be awesome but there is NEVER anyone in the lobby to play online with.
Did not like the game mechanics. Its difficult sometimes to relate the vision with the objective.

A very fun game! I like how theres different modes (with friends in person, online, and with AI), so you can play no matter what. Challenges you and makes you think of neat connections, The only way this could be improved, I think, is if at the end of each round/game with an AI player it told you what their line of thinking was. But thats a pretty small thing, and it isnt less fun because of it
great gAme design and it is like a real Mysterium
Love â¤ï¸ game
Love the boardgame. Now I can take it with me wherever I go. Whoop!
could give more details on expansions and allow us to edit the number of players after we create a room.

Overall, I love the game, with the exception of the AI. Im shocked that you can give clearly obvious cards, and the AI doesn't recognize the connection. Giving horse cards to a horse barn should be obvious. Yet, the AI doesn't get it. I've yet to figure out what some scenario cards need. Once that's fixed, I'll easily give five stars.
Great board game. Bad app. i have to resign in constantly and there always only two or three people on at a time. I haven't gotten to play a single multiplayer game yet.
boring
the app isn't perfect. when i finish games, it tends to give me an error, but the game is great.
game is fun but I can not log in

Somehow, looking at the card with magnifying glass turns me down. It looks so small in my smartphone screen, hard to see. When the AI as the ghost, choose the graphic for us to predict what they see, we cannot communicate (after the game finish) what message/the reason they choose the card. So less interaction, makes thing looks unreasonable. The good thing is that the music adds nuances scary mystery feelings to those who like the game.
fun even with the AI
has a good vibe.but the board game is way more fun
Love it and recommend it!! Excellent game, great graphics, intuitive controls and amazing plot & rules!
AI is dumb, lobbies are empty. No one to play with l
boring..... ai.... dumb
great game excelent for testing the game before getting the full board game
Keeps logging me out
I like this game. Would be better to have more people online. 1* less because of the error with duplicate session. Its very annoying to login after every online game.
instructions are clear but game itself is vague
It's the best, i had a good time playing it with my family

the game itself is great, the the app itself is aweful. it keeps logging you off, you cant look at chat while typing, everything is small, they splited the list of whos online and the chat into 2 tabs. Plus i purchased a addon but after a while it starting showing it as if i never purchased it... just buy it on steam and play it off a laptop or a pc
Nice and atmospheric game. Online part is strange and usually empty, but you could play solo at least.
Great concept for a mobile game, however playing with AI simply does not cut it and there does not seem to be enough of population to reliably play with other people... This is such a shame!

Developer has a habit of continually adding new permissions, always without any explanation or even mentioning them. Trying to get an explanation via email is like pulling teeth, taking several months of back and forth just to get a BS, half-@$$ed answer that only shows they either have no clue what they're talking about or they're lying, neither of which is something I want from the developer of an app I use only my phone.
After a game or two it logs me out.

playing with IA is no fun in this game, unfortunately there are also never any online games available. Graphics and animations look nice, though I'd prefer to see a card full-screen instead of the magnifying glass Downgraded to 1 star because it won't log ne in to my online account

The game itself is a ton of fun and very imaginative. But the mobile app is completely unsupported and riddled with bugs that make the experience tedious. He lobby is filled with dead rooms that never go away making joining an actual room a nightmare. Don't buy it.
Love the game. But what's with the login issues? Lots of errors and keep getting logged out.
Great adaptation and easy to play. Great 15 min filler.

content:
Haven't played the board but have watched videos on board game, gameplay. 
Board game play seems easier to understand. From reviews I've watched the 
digital version doesn't translate well due to AI issues in solo and the 
inability to easily communicate with other players quickly enough when 
playing online multilayer. I have played story mode and have yet to fully 
understand what exactly is going on. You have 2 hours to return after 
purchasing and it is too late now. I am honestly baffled at this point. The 
tutorial in my opinion has left me confused if not more confused as to how 
to play the Game correctly. I feel as though I'm just guessing as to what i 
need to do, and even when i think I've made the correct intuitive 
decision/choices I'm wrong until i ultimately eliminate all other options 
and win. I don't think the board game version translates well at all to 
digital. Would opt to return/refund if I could. If anyone knows of a video 
that explains the games' mechanics better than the tutorial story mode, 
please feel free to pass it along.
So much fun!

You need to refund my $ THE APP WILL NOT INSTALL and this is MY THIRD TIME 
ASKING FOR MY REFUND
Not only could I not install game but it corrupted my SD card

One of my favorite games! It is a little confusing, but don't give up, it 
all makes sense after awhile, and it's so worth it!!
Didn't work on my phone! Lg fortune.. That sucks

Fairly major bug in that it doesn't save your asmodee account details so 
you have to enter them every time.
On the Galaxy S8. It could be smoother. But a fun game none the less

Would rate it five stars, but it won't stay logged in to my Admodee account 
to track my progress. Otherwise devs did a fantastic job creating this game 
in digital format. I don't like the supernatural theme, but I love the game 
mechanics. I re-theme it when I play the board game.

Playing w games and it was fun, good adaptation, and i hope the community 
getting bigger because it's not that many people online.
This is an excellent game. The story mode is intriguing.
Great adaptation of the board game!
Good implementation of boardgame story mode teaches The game
Because of this game, I learned there is such thing as too abstract.
I love this game and the board game. but too bad, I can't choose psychic in solo mode

Love it. Inreresting and not boring. There only thing with login. Faced it on 2 devices. First seems that login is successful but when u try to play it's dropped. Maybe something for developers to check
Fantastic translation of one of my top 10 board games!

Good adaptation. Some cases are really hard to pass when the phantom is AI... I am stuck in a case when no one (not me, not the other 4 AIs) find the true culprit because the AI is really dumb and give cards that does not correspond at all. Will try again and uninstall if it is still the case
It would be nice to be able to look at the whole board and hold back cards for future turns, like in the actual game
It's a fun way to learn  the back story behind the board game.

Fantastic adaptation of the physical game, and is well designed for pass and play mode making evenings with friends playing Mysterium on a tablet a pure joy. My only complaints are that the DLC cannot be used and disappears from the  deck lists if one is offline, frustrating for content that has been paid for,  and additionally the icon to symbolise or toggle whether the DLC packs are toggled into a new game, for example in pass and play, is both unclear and doesn't seem to function. Apart from this, Mysterium on Android is a pure joy!

Thank you for your support !
Best regards,

A good rendition of the board game, even with assosiation being a vital part of the game mechanics. Really enjoyed the story mode, wish there was more challenges and stories like that.

content: Top-notch adaptation. It's not always easy to find an online match, but when you do, the community is excellent - very friendly and welcoming.
I have the board game and use this to introduce people to the table top version.  Such a great time.
Perfect!
Spooky atmospheric and ghoulishly fun.

I love the game but i don't  think there should be a timer. Or give the option of having a timer or not, or to set the timer manually to the players own discretion.  If a real detective only had a couple minutes to solve a case, few crimes would ever get solved.  Please fix this.

The game in Story mode just stucks at a mission named 'A man with an amulet' .  I have played the same mission for more than 20 times. The AI sucks all the time and it just doesn't identify the most obvious matches. For an instance, I gave the clue card with saws to match a person having a sword. It just makes weird guess and it happens all the time in this mission. I am really disappointed with the game. I need my money back.

content: Absolutely no one else playing online

I bought it because I loved the board game and thought it might be fun to play with strangers. The app in itself is pretty good and quite loyal to the original. However there are almost no players online. I've had the game for almost a week now and didn't manage to join one single game so far.. because there is no one playing. That's very disappointing
Good mobile version of a great game.

Love the board game. This is a great smooth running app that makes it eqsy to play quick games of mysterium. AI gets annoying sometimes when they are the psychics, there is always a dumb one that always guesses wrong. But overall, love it
So much fun, and very affordable. The pass and play is absolutely amazingly fun and well done.
I love the boardgame version this let's me get in games when I have no one to play with and perfect for travel

Some of the online mechanics need to be refined. If you have short internet outage/blips of say 3-10 seconds it will disconnect you from the game, sometimes without you knowing. Otherwise I can't fault the app!

content: Probably the best digital tabletop game in the Google store.
Excellent digital version of the tabletop game. Bit of a battery drain but worth it for the visuals. Love it. Online play is my fav. Great ppl in the chat.
Excellent
It's practically the same as the original board game which is awesome as well, just now you can have it everywhere with you on your phone or tablet.

Great digital adaptation of the tabletop game. A bit miffed I lost my Story Mode progress when I had to install the app on a new device; surely that should have been synced with my account. Excited to try to unlock the new bonus content (which seems to be based on special/limited edition cards for the physical game -- very cool). Wish the online game lobby was more active, but the AI makes a decent Ghost (though sometimes obtuse Psychic).
replyContent:
Hello,

content: My only complaint is you can't continue a game you have to stop during pass and play

I Owen the physical game, so I was already familiar with the game.  The graphics are good, great port of the art work.  The story mode was a nice way to teach, but the final answer never changed, even when you had to replay  And that brings us to the problem:  The A.I. Is awful.  Card selection for us to guess isn't too bad (although there had been a few times I never figured it out.  The Eiffel tower indicates a gun?)  The real problem is getting them to guess your choice.  I seem to have had as much luck dumping three cards on them as I do giving an obvious choice.  If the weapon is a wood box, and I give a picture of a large wooden barn amd a music box...why do you choose gun...and then the iron.  I understand not all the associations I could make will match, but some are obvious, and I think colors are ignored completely
This game is extremely frustrating. Maybe the game would be better in real life. Basically you have to match several pictures that have almost nothing in common. I do not recommend this game.

Works great!

content: Great game!  As more people start playing, the 'empty lobby' problem will go away.  One suggestion.  Provide a way for the ghost to specify at the beginning of a game that they will NOT be doing card dumps when a psychic makes a correct pre-selection.  Some people like to play this way, and they should be allowed to do so, but some of us don't like playing that way but are forced to because the psychics expect us to.
replyContent:

Thanks for your feedback, I forward it to the people in charge. :)

content: Great game using symbolism to guess a murder mystery (who, where, what). I liked the board game and really like this game.

The game is good but the AI is a bit strange. I expected as much because AIs are not good with such subjective clues. I would like pass and play too but then the ghost would have to send all the clues before other play their turn and all clues would need a timestamp to know which clues the ghost struggled with. It is doable but might be clunky.

We own the physical copyof the game and love it! Bought this digital to still playwith thekids in the car or RV  trips. Having NO pass and play feature really hurts here. This is made worse that when I've gone to online play almost no one is there to play. So once the story mode is done teaching you the game you are pretty much done. A pass and play option would have been wondeful as is its ended up single player experience against AI which isn't what I expected a translation of a table too game to be...

content: The game itself is great. I just think the AI is really cumbersome. I also think that it's a bit confusing once you learn the rules because it doesn't specify a lot of things that are happening when you play the tutorials and when you play the first levels. It really gets confusing and I have to find myself going to online resources and going to YouTube to try to figure out why certain things don't work this way or that way. It doesn't explain the full rules or anything else. Love the game though.
replyContent:

if you are stuck or need explanation, we are happy to help.

content: Never played the board game, but thought it sounded great. All in all, the game is good, art is beautiful, controls are a bit tiny, but easy enough to use. What caused me to give such a low score is the in-game AI.  I understand many of the connections between the other AI players' visions and guesses (I get a lot of clairvoyance points). My visions, however, seem extremely random, without anything tying them together. I thought it was just that round, but it has continued that way, and it's incredibly frustrating, to the point where I wish I could refund the game. I enjoy a challenge, but not random guessing.  As I said, I haven't played the board game, so maybe that would've helped, but coming in blind, it's just been very frustrating.
Great conversion of a very fun board game. The graphics are phenomenal, and the way the single player game works is surprisingly well done.
It's just like the board game.  The art is gorgeous.  The controls are a bit tiny, but are easy to work around.
I'm quite good with the cardboard version but this one its a bit of a nightmare picking the right cards
Having a blast playing the app version of the game.
Simple concepts  but surprisingly challenging! Great fun.
Great adaptation of the board game!
Love this game, very much like the real board game. Cross platform works perfectly. On!y wish there were more people online to play with :)

content: Worth it!!  I love the board game!!! So excited when I found out it was going to be an app. There are some kinks to work out, which is common on new apps. However, this game is worth it. Fun for all.  I do want to mention, if you have not heard of this game or dixit, this game is going to be strange. It maybe be a bit of a learning curve. However, it is worth it!! Once you get the hang/process of it, you find the fun and challenge of it. It is not tough to learn for most. It is just an outside of the box game. Lots of gray area;) Enjoy:)
I would like a bit more explanation as you play

A good translation of the board game, which we downloaded so we can play remotely (we live 1000 miles apart). Criticisms are not being able to invite specific people to a game, difficulty telling who chose what and when so you can figure out what the ghost is implying when you get it right, and some other UI/UX problems like that.
Very challenging, an awesome game. I'm addicted to being the ghost!

content: â¤ Mysterium
It's quite expensive

I think they did a wonderful job with transitioning this game from a board game to an app. It runs very well and story mode is fun! I haven't done any online or multiplayer gaming yet, but I fully intend to! I saw some very minor issues playing as the ghost and giving out vision cards but overall this is definitely worth the purchase whether you love the board game or are new to Mysterium entirely!

Online games are broken and underpopulated. (May need more time to attract an audience) Solo games are also broken, they don't let you skip the timer after making a decision, and the game doesn't advance during the final phase. Needs some work.
replyContent:
Hello Mr TheArraigner, 

To skip the time, you just have to touch the clock.
Could you contact support to speak about the "broken games"? : https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/mysterium/?l=en

Thanks for your feedback,

content: Ã que j'aime Asmodee, mais votre tutoriel est complÃ¨tement Ã  la ramasse. Comme d'autres l'ont dÃ©jÃ  dit, l'on a aucune idÃ©e de comment jouer aprÃ¨s.

But the interface is small and there are a lot of bugs. Load times are super long too. Oh, and they apparently don't know how to disable the screen timeout either. Playing as the ghost is infuriating.
No directions, no tutorial, no fun. (And yes, I read the rules an they didn't make any sense.

Tried playing as ghost and as psychic, neither role makes sense. Tutorial is not helpful. Artwork is bizarre and confusing. Good luck playing it on a small screen, we had to mirror it to TV to read details. Rules are not explained well; how can there be multiple suspects/rooms/items that are correct? Save your 7 bucks!
replyContent:
Hello Sue, 
There are multiple suspects/rooms/items, but only one is correct. That's the second phase of the game, you are on your own (no chatbox) to find wich story is the good one. 
About your misunderstanding, do not hesitate to contact our support, to speak about this : https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/mysterium/?l=en
Thanks for your feedback,
